context_of_use: The urban mobility planner receives notifications and suggested solutions regarding congestion and neighborhood impacts from mobility measures.
stakeholders_and_interests: urban mobility planner: Ensure effective urban mobility proposals and fairness in measures.
description: This use case allows the urban mobility planner to receive notifications about congestion and neighborhood impacts, along with suggested solutions for congestion.
triggering_event: A mobility measure is implemented that may lead to congestion or neighborhood impacts.
preconditions: The urban mobility planner is logged into the Urban Mobility Management System.
postconditions: The urban mobility planner receives notifications about congestion and neighborhood impacts.
The urban mobility planner receives suggested solutions for congestion.
assumptions: The system is capable of monitoring mobility measures and their impacts.
Notifications are sent in real-time to the urban mobility planner.
requirements_met: The system shall notify the urban mobility planner if a measure leads to congestion.
The system shall provide suggested solutions for traffic congestion.
The system shall notify the urban mobility planner if a measure disadvantages a neighborhood.
outstanding_issues: Clarification on the criteria for sending notifications and suggested solutions.
main_flow: 1. urban mobility planner → System sends notification if a measure leads to congestion.
2. urban mobility planner → System sends notification if a measure disadvantages a neighborhood.
3. urban mobility planner → System provides suggested solutions for traffic congestion.
alternative_flows: AF-1 (from Step 1): If the congestion notification is received, the urban mobility planner reviews the suggested solutions.
